      • init

        public void init()
        Description copied from interface: com.mrcrayfish.device.core.Wrappable
        The default initialization method. Clears any components in the default layout and sets it as the current layout. If you override this method and are using the default layout, make sure you call it using super.init()
        Specified by:

      • render

        public void render(com.mrcrayfish.device.core.Laptop laptop,
                   net.minecraft.client.Minecraft mc,
                   int x,
                   int y,
                   int mouseX,
                   int mouseY,
                   boolean active,
                   float partialTicks)
        Description copied from interface: com.mrcrayfish.device.core.Wrappable
        The main render loop. Note if you override, make sure you call this super method.
        Specified by:
        render in interface com.mrcrayfish.device.core.Wrappable
        Parameters:
        laptop - laptop instance
        mc - a Minecraft instance
        x - the starting x position
        y - the start y position
        mouseX - the mouse position x
        mouseY - the mouse position y
        active - if the window active
        partialTicks - time passed since tick
